content.text:
# Nandi Award for Best Female Playback Singer__disambig_1

The Nandi Award for Best Female Playback Singer was awarded from 1977 to 2016 by the Government of Andhra Pradesh.

{| class="wikitable sortable"
|-

Nandi TV Awards
The Nandi TV Award for Best Female Playback Singer in a Telugu television serial was also awarded every year until 2016.
